Ian Badcoe wrote:

>
>	thoughts anyone?
>  
>
 From my experiments last year in evolving NEAT parameters I came to the 
conclusion that there isn't much improvement to be had from optimising 
the parameters. Values obtained from a combination of educated guessing, 
some experimentation and maybe a sprinkle of anecdotal evidence gets you 
a set of params that are near optimal IMO. On the other hand I didn't 
perform a particularly exhaustive analysis.

Colin
